items.name: RADH
items.purification_method: Three protocols: (1) No Ca2+ ions; (2) 0.2 mmol/L CaCl2 in all buffers; (3) 0.8 mmol/L CaCl2 in all buffers. Steps: Size exclusion chromatography (SEC) for initial desalting, anion exchange, followed by a second SEC for salt removal and Ca2+ adjustment. Buffer: TEA–HCl 50 mmol/L, pH 7.5, at 20–25°C.
items.purity_specification: SDS–PAGE (NuPAGE Novex Bis–Tris gels 4–12%). Stained with SimplyBlue SafeStain or SilverXpress Silver Staining Kit.
items.special_treatment: Protein concentration determined via Bradford assay (bovine serum albumin standard). Native MW determined by SEC (Superdex 200, with calibration curve). Storage tested as desalting buffer (8°C, –20°C), with 50% glycerol (–20°C), or freeze-dried (–20°C).
